snippet: Sam Kass, who cooks dinner for President Obama several nights a week, is one of 480 White House employees expected to receive furlough notices stemming from the across-the-board budget cuts.
abstract: Sam Kass, who cooks dinner for President Obama several nights a week, is one of 480 White House employees expected to receive furlough notices stemming from the across-the-board budget cuts.

headline.main: Obama Chef Told to Plan Some Time Off
